001package net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.optimizer;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.linalg.Vector;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.linalg.Vectors;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.model.DataSet;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.model.HyperparameterConfigurable;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.model.scalars.LinearCombination;
008import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.ObjectiveFunction;
009import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.Optimizer;
010import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.TrainableFunction;
011
012import java.util.Arrays;
013import java.util.HashMap;
014import java.util.Map;
015
016public class GradientDescentOptimizer<E extends TrainableFunction<N>, N extends Number> implements Optimizer<E, N>, HyperparameterConfigurable {
017
018    private final ObjectiveGradientEstimator<N> objectiveGradientEstimator;
019    private final GradientDescentModelDecomposer<E, N> modelDecomposer;
020    private final UpdateStep<LinearCombination<N>, N> updateStep;
021
022    public GradientDescentOptimizer(GradientDescentModelDecomposer<E, N> modelDecomposer, UpdateStep<LinearCombination<N>, N> updateStep) {
023        this(new ObjectiveGradientEstimator<>(), modelDecomposer, updateStep);
024    }
025
026    protected GradientDescentOptimizer(ObjectiveGradientEstimator<N> objectiveGradientEstimator, GradientDescentModelDecomposer<E, N> modelDecomposer, UpdateStep<LinearCombination<N>, N> updateStep) {
027        this.objectiveGradientEstimator = objectiveGradientEstimator;
028        this.modelDecomposer = modelDecomposer;
029        this.updateStep = updateStep;
030    }
031
032    @Override
033    public void optimize(E estimationFunction, DataSet<N> trainingSet, ObjectiveFunction<N> objective, int step) {
034        Map<LinearCombination<N>, Vector<N>> accumulatedAdjustments = new HashMap<>();
035        N trainingSetSize = estimationFunction.getCurrentNumberType().valueOf(trainingSet.size());
036        for (DataSet.Sample<N> sample : trainingSet) {
037            Vector<N> objectiveGradients = objectiveGradientEstimator.determineGradient(sample, estimationFunction, objective);
038            modelDecomposer.calculateDecompositionGradients(estimationFunction, objectiveGradients, sample.features())
039                    .forEach(d -> accumulatedAdjustments.merge(d.linearCombination(), d.parameterGradients(), Vector::add));
040        }
041
042        accumulatedAdjustments.forEach((m, a) -> {
043            if (step == 1) {
044                System.out.println("0: Applying accumulated adjustment for model: " + Arrays.toString(m.getParameters()));
045            }
046            N[] parameters = m.getParameters();
047            Vector<N> meanGradients = a.divide(trainingSetSize);
048            Vector<N> adjustments = updateStep.calculateUpdate(meanGradients, m, step, objective.getRegularizations());
049            Vector<N> thetas = Vectors.of(m.getCurrentNumberType(), parameters).transpose();
050            Vector<N> updatedThetas = thetas.add(adjustments);
051            N[] updatedParameters = updatedThetas.asArray();
052            m.setParameters(updatedParameters);
053            System.out.println(step + ": Applied accumulated adjustment for model: " + Arrays.toString(m.getParameters()));
054        });
055    }
056
057    public UpdateStep<LinearCombination<N>, N> getUpdateStep() {
058        return updateStep;
059    }
060
061    @Override
062    public Map<String, Object> getHyperparameters() {
063        if (updateStep instanceof HyperparameterConfigurable configurable) {
064            return configurable.getHyperparameters();
065        }
066        return Map.of();
067    }
068
069    @Override
070    public void setHyperparameter(String name, Object value) {
071        if (updateStep instanceof HyperparameterConfigurable configurable) {
072            configurable.setHyperparameter(name, value);
073        }
074    }
075}
